comment: Congratulations To : Mr. and Mrs . John Legend Welcoming Your Beautiful Baby Boy Into The World. Best Wishes And Lots Of Love .From The Big Apple, Sharon Maddicks. I know his big sister Luna will be a terrific , protective , sister to her baby brother.

# ::snt Congratulations To : Mr. and Mrs . John Legend Welcoming Your Beautiful Baby Boy Into The World. Best Wishes And Lots Of Love .From The Big Apple, Sharon Maddicks. I know his big sister Luna will be a terrific , protective , sister to her baby brother.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / congratulate-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Mr."
                              :op2 "John"
                              :op3 "Legend"))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Mrs."
                              :op2 "John"
                              :op3 "John"
                              :op4 "Legend")))
            :ARG2 (w / welcome-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (b / boy
                        :mod (b2 / baby)
                        :mod (b3 / beautiful)
                        :poss (y / you))
                  :ARG2 (w2 / world)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (w3 / wish-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                    :ARG1 t)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / most))))
            :op2 (l / love-01
                  :quant (l2 / lot))
            :source (b4 / broadcast-program
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "The"
                        :op2 "Big"
                        :op3 "Apple")))
      :snt3 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Luna")
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 (h4 / he)
                              :ARG2 (s / sister)
                              :mod (b5 / big)))
                  :ARG1 h4
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sister
                        :ARG0-of (p4 / protect-01
                              :ARG1 p3)
                        :ARG0-of (h5 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 h4
                              :ARG2 (b6 / brother
                                    :mod (b7 / baby)))
                        :mod (t2 / terrific)))))
